title: Between You And Us: Episode 3
description:
Cover your trouser! We're back with some PHAT reviews, ranging from Starbucks to Mount Rushmore. This episode = was passable. Just don't laugh too loudly or we'll call security... and remember, fishing is NOT a crime.

If you'd like to submit a funny review, email us at beachtoosandy@gmail.com with "Between You And Us" in the subject line!

Buy our merch! https://store.dftba.com/collections/beach-too-sandy-water-too-wet

Logo by Courtney DeKorte. Theme by Mavus White.

Music by PSOVOD and typos.
